Name: A Day In Space
About the game: DISCORD A DAY IN SPACE Live a space adventure on board of 'Space Colony,' a high tech space station sent to colonise the newly discovered Planet Omega in 2040. In this interactive, space exploration experience you will: Explore the giant 'Space Colony I' Space Station; Carry out your daily tasks; Interact with your crewmates, getting to know their personal stories; Find out about the reasons behind mankind's first space colonisation; Gather all the clues to find out about the staggering truth behind your cremates' deaths.
